articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Apex Legends’ new character, Vantage: Full ability kit and Ultimate
articles.description: Apex Legends’ newest contestant is named Vantage and uses her friendly bat companion to move around the map, her Passive ability eyepiece to scout enemies, and her custom sniper to take them out with her Ultimate ability.
articles.content: Vantage even gets her own bat and custom rifle

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: Joker 2’s 2024 release date announced by Lady Gaga
articles.description: Lady Gaga has unveiled the release date for Joker: Folie à Deux, the sequel to Todd Phillips’ 2019 film Joker. Gaga is set to star opposite of returning star Joaquin Phoenix as Harley Quinn, Joker’s longtime lover and partner in crime.
articles.content: Joker: Folie à Deux, the sequel to Todd Phillips critically-lauded 2019 film Joker, finally has a release date. Lady Gaga, who is slated to star opposite returning star Joaquin Phoenix as the Jokers … [+912 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Clark
articles.title: Pokémon’s Clarks collaboration shows off Pikachu on a pair of Wallabees
articles.description: The newest Pokémon shoe collaboration is with the long-running brand Clarks. The Clarks collaboration puts Pikachu theming on the brand’s iconic Wallabee shoe, which is available now.
articles.content: Pikachu has been extremely busy in the fashion world, lending his adorable appearance to many sneakers and shoes over the years from Converse to Adidas. The newest Pokémon collaboration, at least whe… [+963 chars]

articles.author: Toussaint Egan
articles.title: The Banshees of Inisherin reunites Colin Farrell and Brendan Gleeson
articles.description: Three Billboards director Martin McDonagh’s latest tragicomic film stars Colin Farrell and Brendan Gleeson as two old friends whose feud threatens to disrupt their small, close-knit Irish community. The Banshees of Inisherin has an Oct. 21 release date in the…
articles.content: McDonaghs latest reunites In Bruges Farrell and Brendan Gleeson in the Irish countryside

articles.author: Nicole Carpenter
articles.title: Pokémon Scarlet and Violet Paldea trailer: Pokémon’s new region
articles.description: Pokémon Scarlet and Violet will be released on Nintendo Switch on Nov. 18, and ahead of that date, The Pokémon Company revealed more about Paldea region.

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Saints Row publisher Koch Media now called Plaion after rebranding
articles.description: Koch Media, the parent of Saints Row publisher Deep Silver, rebranded itself to Plaion on Aug. 4.
articles.content:
Koch Media, the Saints Row publisher whose name few could correctly, or consistently, pronounce, is rebranding. The German-Austrian company is now Plaion.
For the record, Plaion is pronounced play-o… [+1926 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Pendragon tabletop RPG blends The Green Knight with Crusader Kings 3
articles.description: Pendragon, the classic tabletop RPG, is back with a brilliant new 6th edition. We preview Greg Stafford’s “magnum opus” from Gen Con 2022.
articles.content: The Green Knight wowed audiences last year with its moody lighting and mystical storyline not to mention Dev Patels outstanding performance. What stunned many critics was its authentic presentation o… [+3970 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Square Enix’s Tactics Ogre remake announced for PlayStation, Switch, PC
articles.description: Tactics Ogre: Reborn has been officially revealed in a new trailer for the remake of the classic tactics RPG, which is coming to Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, and PC via Steam.
articles.content: After months of leaks, Tactics Ogre: Reborn is revealed

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: MultiVersus season 1 release date delayed, says WB Games
articles.description: The open beta for MultiVersus, which began July 26, will continue for PlayStation, PC, and Xbox, while season 1 content, including Rick and Morty, are delayed “to a later date.”
articles.content: MultiVersus, the Warner Bros. ensemble fighting game whose free, open beta began last week, will have its first season of content delayed to an unspecified later date, the games official Twitter acco… [+1163 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: She-Hulk’s creators and star voice support for VFX unions
articles.description: In light of recent accusations toward Disney about its demands on CGI artists and VFX houses,  She-Hulk’s Tatiana Maslany, Jessica Gao, and Kat Coiro have voiced their support of efforts to unionize, and acknowledge that the work is often rushed.
